New Records: Cole Palmer scored his first international goal for England
Key Match Events: Trent Alexander-Arnold scored a stunning volley for England's second goal
Harry Kane scored a late goal to seal the win for England
Cole Palmer scored a penalty to put England ahead
Eberechi Eze and Palmer produced positive displays on their first England starts
Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate picked a team of Euro 2024 hopefuls
Ben Stokes gave England a team talk to adapt to pressure and nerves
Bosnia captain Edin Dzeko believes England can win Euro 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Gareth Southgate was pleased with the performance and said it gave him some extra headaches, but that's a good thing
Harry Kane said it's been a really good camp and a good game for England
Cole Palmer said it's a dream feeling to score his first goal for England
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a warm-up for England's Euro 2024 campaign
England will play one more warm-up game before the official squad announcement and the beginning of Euro 2024
The round of 16, if England were to qualify, would begin from 29 June, with England playing on 30 June in Gelsenkirchen at 5pm BST if they manage to top the group
Others: Gareth Southgate made seven changes to the side that drew 2-2 to Belgium in the last international break
England are unbeaten in their last eleven friendly matches against European nations since losing 3-2 away at France in June 2017
Bosnia and Herzegovina have lost their last four matches, conceding 13 goals across these games
